a1b2c3d4.name: Solar Power Subsystem
a1b2c3d4.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on portability and lightweight design.

embodiment.principle: Flexible Photovoltaic Panels with Compact Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses lightweight, flexible solar panels and compact lithium-ion batteries for easy portability and reduced weight.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

a1b2c3d4.verification_plan: Test under varying solar conditions to ensure energy output meets requirements.
